dct_title_s: Hammond's operational map of the world on Mercator projection.
dct_description_sm: C.S. Hammond & Company. North Decimal Degree 90.000000. South Decimal Degree -90.0000. East Decimal Degree 90.0000. West Decimal Degree 105.0000. Universal transverse Mercator projection.
